name: FIGHT PLANE 機戰
description:
"FIGHT PLANE 機戰" is a hard-core clear-cut shooting air combat game. Players control the fighter plane to shuttle through the sky full of bullets. While improving the fighter plane's ability, challenge powerful enemies at the same time!!!

Choose Different Fight Plane

Different Weapons

Challenge Different Difficulty



More than 50+ levels are playable, and more will be added in the future. . .
Now upgrade your fighter to defeat stronger enemies!!!
